mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.name,a.passowrd,a.client_id,a.platform_id,a.status,a.remark,a.update_date,a.insert_date, c.name as clientName,g.name as platformName,u1.name as updateUser,u2.name as insertUser FROM accounts a LEFT JOIN clients c ON a.client_id = c.id LEFT JOIN gaming_platform g ON g.id = c.platform_id LEFT JOIN users u1 on a.update_user = u1.id LEFT JOIN users u2 on a.insert_user = u2.id WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE accounts SET name = #{name}, password = #{password}, client_id = #{clientId}, platfrom_id = #{platformId}, status = #{status}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_user = #{updateUser} WHERE id = #{id}
